EmailTemplate.name: 202006_APAC_Airlines_APU-I_Webinar_ON24.Invitation_APU-I_Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Aerospace Webinars: Auxiliary Power Unit (APU)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
As promised, we are back with a power-packed series of two informative webinars on the topics listed below. You and your colleagues are cordially invited to join us for these webinars, and learn first-hand about technical/reliability and product updates.
June 17: APU - Technical Updates and Roadmap, covering
- 131-9 A/B APU Reliability and technical updates
- 331-500 APU Reliability and technical updates
Speakers: Denise George, Jason Hall, Rusty LeSueur REGISTER NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/06/apu-technical-updates]]> June 18: APU - Technical Updates and Roadmap, covering
- 331-350 APU Reliability and technical updates - HGT-1700 APU Reliability and technical updates
Speaker: Michael Reinheimer REGISTER NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/06/apu-technical-updates-2]]>
